original_title: Vagabundo - Ney Matogrosso Pedro Luis e a Parede
overview: This incredible partnership brings the stamped voices of Ney Matogrosso and Pedro Luis, in addition to percussion of "A Parede" (The Wall). "Vagabundo" mix semi-unreleased songs of Rio's underground scene with already established songs like "A ordem Ã© samba" (The order is samba) by Jackson do Pandeiro and "Disritmia" (Dysrhythmia).
title: Vagabundo - Ney Matogrosso Pedro Luis e a Parede
